doc.field: Series XXIII: Pride and Progress / The Right Stuff
Series XXIII: Pride and Progress / The Right Stuff
[1]--Pride and Progress, Episode No. 50 [2]--The Right Stuff [Air Date: unknown]
[1]--Pride and Progress, Episode No. 50 [2]--The Right Stuff [Air Date: unknown]

Pride and ProgressNews-highlights:1. NEW FORMAT: Gay Week in Review, with Andy Humm, Joyce Hunter, and Darrell Yates Rist2. US State Dept requires employees to take HIV antibody test, disallowing those positive from working abroad3. Vermont put $150,000 to educate state about AIDS, NYC Board of Education produces a public school film "Sex, Drugs, and AIDS"4. Kentucky state county judge ruled that Sodomy Laws violate the Kentucky state constitution5.Discussion of a National Gay and Lesbian March on Washington DC, Oct 11th 19876. Discussion of the New York Times' playing down the threat of AIDS infection for heterosexual couples, and misrepresentation of the statistical facts of infectionCOMMERCIAL: "First Hand" gay magazine7. Andy Humm on Cary Grant's lawsuit against Chevy ChaseCOMMERCIAL: Stamp Out AIDS featuring Jennifer Bassey8. Continuing coverage of the 2nd annual meeting of gay and lesbian elected officials in Washington, DC9. National Association of Gay and Lesbian Democratic Clubs to remain part of the party despite 53% voting to remove Democratic affiliation10. Mood of the gay and lesbian leaders, and need for a national leader like Harvey Milk11. Gay politicians agree to back the March in Washington DCCOMMERCIAL: "New York Native" with Quentin Crisp12. News Brief, announcements13. Belle Glade, Florida, study finds high rate of AIDS infections due to sexual contact and IV drug use14. Georgia Fraternal Order of Police Officers tries to ban homosexuals from joining the force15. Gay man forced to resign from Canadian Mounted Police sues the department16. Man banned from seeing his child due to positive HTLVIII test appeals the court's decision17. Announcement of film "Rights and Reactions"18. Sports Report, with clips from the 1986 Gay Games19. Closing credits over news clips of tennis star Boris Becker
The Right Stuff:1. This Week in Gay History with Jeff BixbyCOMMERCIAL: "Manscape" gay magazineCOMMERCIAL: The Monster2. Media Watch with Brandon Judell, with clips from "Escape from Alcatraz"3. Announcement of Cary Grant's death and homosexual rumors, with clips4. Richard Pryor's Barbara Walters' special on question of AIDS status, with clips
[1]--Pride and Progress, Episode No. 50 [2]--The Right Stuff [Air Date: unknown]: circa 1985 - 1986
